name: Territory Tiff
description:
The goal of this game is to sit in the Red Territory for a collective 10 seconds every level working your way through 8 levels

Controls

  • When playing with keyboard use W A S D  for movement use Space as your selection and press E to pause the game
  • When playing with controller use Left Thumbstick for movement use the "A" button to select and the Start button to pause (Note should work on Xbox controller but has not been test only has been test with a playstation controller)

Music

The music was made for this game during the course of the jam  by one of my friends

Extra notes

This game jam was by far the most fun one that i have participated in so far and this is easily the game I'm most proud of having made and if your reading this thanks for playing my game i hope you enjoy it.
